body.p:
Carrollton Ky Jany 61
Honbl B. Magoffin

Your petitioners would respectfully state that at the special term of the Carroll Circuit Court held in Decer. 1860. William Anderson was fined $50 for retailing liquor to a minor. We would further state that Anderson was not apprised that he was violating any law that he is a good law abiding citizen
We therefore pray your excellency to remit said fine

William Anderson
W. M. Fishel
John Hogan clk
John R Vance clerk C. C. C
H Cox Judge County Court

Carroll
Cir ct
$50 } Selling liquor
Wm Anderson
Issd Jany 18, 1861
